Pi3 DynDNS
item.description: This has been replaced Pi3 DynDNS I want to give my home’s Raspberry Pi3 a DNS name so that I can access it more easily. DNS and Dynamic IP Addresses The Domain Naming System is how those readable textual names like example.com become the actual IP Addresses like 127.0.0.1 that web pages, email, and everything else needs to work. Various groups allow people to register a domain (or subdomain) and specify the IP address of a computer that the domain should reffer to.
